EmailTemplate.description: Connect to 'Send Generic Email' on salesforce. Used to send one off emails to groups of YPs.
EmailTemplate.name: Exam Results Day Email: Matched
EmailTemplate.subject: Good Luck From Step Forward
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good luck!
Hi, We wish you the best of luck on exam results day here at Step Forward. We hope it went well. We look forward to having you start the programme and hope you're ready for a year that will change your life. Best wishes!
Step Forward
WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM
The Challenge Network is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 39 York Rd, London SE1 7NQ
